ThingDef.label: Siege armor
ThingDef.description: It is a JE-342A7 "Dvergr (Dwarf)" siege armor. Like many other this Fort world corporation products, Dvergr siege armor has the single-minded focus on the it's main purpose. In this case, the main purpose is a survival of the wearer.

ThingDef.label: Siege armor helmet
ThingDef.description: Rugged and trustworthy helmet of the siege armor.

ThingDef.label: Close combat armor
ThingDef.description: A modified version of "Dvergr" siege armor, JE-257A1 "Einherjar" close combat armor is the one of most fearsome urban warfare equipment. Although most of thick armor plates are removed, brutal force from high power actuators and fast recharging shield compensate for the loss.

ThingDef.label: Combat armor helmet
ThingDef.description: Helmet of the close combat armor. Close combat assisting pseudo A. I integrated.
